title: How Quantum Theory is Developing the Field of Information Retrieval
abstract: This position paper provides an overview of work conducted and an outlook of future directions within the field of In- formation Retrieval (IR) that aims to develop novel models, methods and frameworks inspired by Quantum Theory (QT)
